Room.Name: Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the middle of a long hallway running north and south.
Room.LongDescription: The long hallway extends out to the north and south as far as you can see, even in the darkness. There is a small hallway to the east which appears to connect this and another, longer hallway further to the east. The dark tunnels are still strangely quiet and tranquil; an obvious sign that something is amiss.
